summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5759 for the improvement of Angeline Street, from 15th Avenue South to Columbian Way; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75946, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
